parameters.toolDescription: Get detailed DeFi positions by wallet and protocol

options.systemMessage:
You are a blockchain DeFi data assistant. Your task is to fetch, analyze, and summarize Aave-related DeFi positions using the Moralis DeFi API, then deliver a human-readable report to the user via Telegram.

Your task is to:
1. Fetch, analyze, and summarize Aave-related DeFi positions using the Moralis DeFi API.
2. Collect data from the following three API endpoints:
   - **getDefiSummary**  
     URL: https://deep-index.moralis.io/api/v2.2/wallets/{{ $json.wallet_address }}/defi/summary  
     Description: Retrieves a list of all DeFi protocols the wallet is interacting with.

   - **getDefiPositionsSummary**  
     URL: https://deep-index.moralis.io/api/v2.2/wallets/{{ $json.wallet_address }}/defi/positions  
     Description: Provides a summary of DeFi protocol positions for the wallet, including collateral and debt levels.

   - **getDefiPositionsByProtocol**  
     URL: https://deep-index.moralis.io/api/v2.2/wallets/{{ $json.wallet_address }}/defi/aave-v3/positions  
     Description: Returns detailed Aave position data, including pool details, underlying assets, balances, and health factors.

🔹 Your output format must follow this structure:

1️⃣ **Header**  
📊 Aave DeFi Health Report
Wallet: {{wallet_address}}
Date: {{$json.current_date}}

2️⃣ **Position Summary (Loop over each Aave pool position)**  

▪️ Pool: {{pool_name}}
• Supply: ${{supplyBalanceUSD}}
• Borrowed: ${{borrowBalanceUSD}}
• Collateral: ${{collateralValueUSD}}
• Health Factor: {{healthFactor}}
• Liquidation Threshold: {{liquidationThreshold}}
• Liquidation Risk: {{liquidationRisk ? "⚠️ Yes" : "No"}}

Underlying Assets:
{{#each underlyingAssets}}
- {{name}} ({{symbol}}): {{balance}}
{{/each}}


, 

4️⃣ **Readable Numbers:**  
- Format large numbers with commas (e.g., `15,000` instead of `15000`).
- Display ETH values to 4 decimal places for easy reading.

5️⃣ **Fallback Message**  
If no Aave data is found, reply with:

❌ No Aave V3 positions found for this wallet.

6️⃣ **Example Telegram Output:**  

📊 Aave DeFi Health Report
Wallet: 0xA221674eDB403A8F714F66Af74a2332c3CB5C0c3
Date: 2025-05-08

▪️ Pool: Aave Lending Pool
• Supply: $15,000.00
• Borrowed: $7,500.00
• Collateral: $15,000.00
• Health Factor: 2.00
• Liquidation Threshold: 1.05
• Liquidation Risk: No
• Net Worth
Underlying Assets:

DAI: 10,000

USDC: 5,000


🔹 **Instructions:**  
- Fetch data directly from the Moralis API endpoints provided.  
- Parse and format the response according to the structure above.  
- Send the formatted message to the specified Telegram Chat ID.  
- If no data is available, send the fallback message instead.  
- This report should be updated every 30 minutes and triggered on critical health factors (<1.1).

parameters.content:
## ⏰ Scheduler

🔁 Triggers the workflow at fixed intervals (default: every X hours)

✅ Used for automatic periodic scanning of all wallets in the sheet.

## 📄 Google Sheets Wallet Loader

📌 Purpose: Loads wallet addresses from a Google Sheet

➕ Add wallet: Insert a new row
➖ Remove wallet: Delete the row

⚠️ Required column: `wallet_address`
🗂️ Source Sheet: [Google Sheet link]

## 🧩 Set Variables

🪪 `Wallet_Address` – used in all API calls and report labels  
📅 `current_date` – dynamically generates today's date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format

✅ Enables personalized reporting per wallet

## 🤖 Aave AI Report Generator

🧠 Uses LangChain + GPT to generate a DeFi health report for Aave V3 positions

📥 Input: `Wallet_Address`, `current_date`
📊 Fetches data from Moralis API:
  - /defi/summary
  - /defi/positions
  - /defi/aave-v3/positions

🧾 Outputs formatted message sent to:
- Telegram
- Email

## 📡 Moralis API – DeFi Summary

🔎 URL (dynamic): /wallets/{{$json.Wallet_Address}}/defi/summary  
📋 Description: Fetches protocols wallet is using  
⚠️ Requires valid Moralis API Key (HTTP Header Auth)

## 📡 Moralis API – Position Summary

🔎 URL (dynamic): /wallets/{{$json.Wallet_Address}}/defi/positions  
📋 Description: Gets protocol-level position data (supply, borrow, collateral)  
⚠️ Required for high-level Aave analysis

## 📡 Moralis API – Aave V3 Details

🔎 URL (dynamic): /wallets/{{$json.Wallet_Address}}/defi/aave-v3/positions  
📋 Description: Gets pool-level breakdown (assets, health factor, risk)  
🚨 Critical for liquidation monitoring

## 📧 Send Aave Report via Gmail

📤 Sends formatted HTML email report  
📥 Input: `htmlBody`, `subject` from code node  
📌 To: <<Replace Email>>

✅ Requires Gmail OAuth2 credential

## 📨 Format Email Report

🧾 Converts report to HTML + plain text for Gmail delivery  
🪪 Uses: `Wallet_Address`, `current_date`  
📅 Date is auto-formatted on each run

⚠️ Replace static wallet/date if hardcoded

## 📲 Telegram Message Delivery

📤 Sends Aave summary message to Telegram chat  
📥 Input: AI output in Markdown/HTML format  
✅ Used for real-time updates and alerts

📌 Chat ID: <<Replace ChatId>>

## 🧠 OpenAI Chat Model

📌 Model: `gpt-4o-mini` (high-speed, multi-modal optimized)

🎯 Role: Processes prompts and generates DeFi summaries and insights  
🔗 Connected to LangChain Agent node  
📥 Inputs: `Wallet_Address`, `current_date`  
📤 Output: Natural language Telegram/Email report via AI Agent

✅ Ensure your OpenAI API credentials are set

# 🧠 AAVE Portfolio Professional AI Agent – Full System Documentation

A next-generation AI-powered DeFi portfolio analyzer built to monitor **multiple wallet addresses** and generate structured Aave V3 health reports via Telegram and Email using LangChain + GPT-4o + Moralis API.

---

## 🧩 Included Components (Workflows)

> Download and install the following nodes and credentials to ensure full system operation.

| Component Name                         | Function                                                               |
| -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ✅ Schedule Trigger                     | Runs the agent periodically (e.g. every hour)                          |
| ✅ Google Sheets Wallet Loader          | Reads wallet addresses from a Google Sheet                             |
| ✅ Set Variables                        | Injects wallet address + current date into the flow                    |
| ✅ AAVE Portfolio Professional AI Agent | LangChain Agent calling OpenAI + Moralis APIs to analyze wallet health |
| ✅ Moralis API Nodes (3)                | Fetches DeFi summary, positions, and Aave V3-specific data             |
| ✅ OpenAI Chat Model                    | Provides GPT-4o-mini language model for report generation              |
| ✅ Format Email                         | Converts AI output into styled HTML + plain text                       |
| ✅ Telegram Message Delivery            | Sends summary report to Telegram chat                                  |
| ✅ Gmail Email Sender                   | Sends full HTML report to configured email address                     |

---

## ⚙️ Installation Instructions

### Step 1: Import Workflow

1. Open your **n8n editor UI**.
2. Import the `AAVE_Portfolio_Professional_AI_Agent.json` file.
3. Ensure all nodes are **connected**, especially Google Sheets → AI Agent.

### Step 2: Google Sheets Setup

1. Create a new sheet with a column titled `wallet_address`.
2. Add the Ethereum wallet addresses you want to monitor in each row.
3. Connect your Google Sheets OAuth2 credential to the workflow.

### Step 3: Credentials Setup

| Service  | Type             | Setup Instructions                                                |
| -------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Moralis  | HTTP Header Auth | Add `X-API-Key: YOUR_MORALIS_KEY`                                 |
| OpenAI   | OpenAI API       | Use `gpt-4o-mini` or your preferred model                         |
| Gmail    | Gmail OAuth2     | Connect your Google Account for email delivery                    |
| Telegram | Telegram Bot API | Link your bot with the correct Chat ID (`539847013` or as needed) |

---

## 🖥️ System Overview

**Data Flow:**

```
[Scheduler or Manual Run] 
→ [Google Sheet: Wallets] 
→ [Set Wallet + Date]
→ [Moralis API Data Fetch] 
→ [LangChain + GPT Summary]
→ [Telegram + Email Report Delivery]
```

**Analysis Includes:**

* Supply / Borrow / Collateral per pool
* Liquidation threshold & health factor
* Asset-level breakdowns (e.g., WBTC, USDC)
* Liquidation risk alerts (⚠️)

---

## 📬 Output Format

* Telegram Message: human-readable summary for each wallet
* Email Report: full HTML + plain text with tables and asset detail
* Includes dynamic wallet address and current date per report

---

## 🔧 Customization Ideas

* Add Telegram commands like `/aave 0x123...` to trigger on-demand
* Set health-factor alerts (< 1.2) to notify immediately
* Export to Notion, CSV, or build dashboard integrations

---

## 🚀 Support & Licensing

🔗 **Don Jayamaha – LinkedIn**
[http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

_metadata.name: AAVE Portfolio Professional AI Agent | Telegram + Email + GPT-4o + Moralis
